instructions: Place the dinner plate in the center bottom of the table cloth.
Place the salad plate in the center of the dinner plate.
Place the napkin in the center of the salad plate.
Place the wine glass on the top right corner of the table cloth.
Place the water glass on the table cloth, directly below and to the right of the wine glass.
Place the salad fork near the bottom left edge of the table cloth, with teeth pointing upwards.
Place the dinner fork directly to the right of the salad fork, facing upward.
Place the dinner knife directly to the right of the dinner plate, teeth facing inward and&nbsp; head pointing up.
Place the soup spoon to the right of the dinner knife, with the head facing upward.
